5.71. 
Inheritance of the farmer's holding
In cases where the division of the holding is likely to disrupt the holding, the heir who has worked mainly on the holding inherited and is willing and prepared to farm it himself shall have priority to the holding and its inventory. In the event of a dispute, the court may postpone the payment of the compensation due to the other heirs in respect of their respective shares for up to ten years by deciding to impose a compulsory mortgage on all the immovable property belonging to that heir.
